extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic and clinical data of included participants

caption.p: Demographic and clinical data of included participants

table-wrap-foot.p: Abbreviations: HC, healthy control; MCI, mild cognitive impairment; AD, Alzheimer disease; MMSE, Mini-Mental State Examination; CERAD, Consortium to Establish a Registry for Alzheimer’s Disease neuropsychological assessment battery. Group comparisons were done based on analysis of variance, p < 0.05 as a threshold of significance, except for sex (Kruskal–Wallis test)

extracted-table.transformed-table:
Table 1
Demographic and clinical data of included participants
HCMCIADp-value
Mean age, year (SD)54.71 (9.99)70.19 (6.65)70.5 (8.50) < 0.001
N (female)24 (9)16 (12)30 (11)0.03
Mean MMSE score (SD)29.44 (1.10)26.64 (2.20)22.68 (4.40) < 0.001
Mean CREAD NAB total (SD)86 (8.23)67.89 (11.54)53.67 (11.94) < 0.001Abbreviations: HC, healthy control; MCI, mild cognitive impairment; AD, Alzheimer disease; MMSE, Mini-Mental State Examination; CERAD, Consortium to Establish a Registry for Alzheimer’s Disease neuropsychological assessment battery. Group comparisons were done based on analysis of variance, p < 0.05 as a threshold of significance, except for sex (Kruskal–Wallis test)
